import org.openqa.selenium.By;
import org.openqa.selenium.WebDriver;
import org.openqa.selenium.chrome.ChromeDriver;


public class Flipcart {

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
	System.setProperty("webdriver.chrome.driver","C:\\Users\\sagar.shivnath\\Downloads\\chromedriver_win32(5)\\chromedriver.exe");
	
				
				WebDriver driver=new ChromeDriver(); 
				//implicity will apply globaly
				driver.get("https://www.flipkart.com/"); //hit the url on browser
				//click 
				driver.findElement(By.cssSelector("input[class='_3704LK']")).click();
				//search with mobiles
				driver.findElement(By.cssSelector("input[class='_3704LK']")).sendKeys("mobiles");
				//it will click 1st iteam 
				driver.findElement(By.xpath("//div[@class='_4rR01T']")).click();
				//it will print the prize of the item
				driver.findElement(By.xpath("//div[@class='_30jeq3 _16Jk6d']")).getText();
				//it will add to the card 
				driver.findElement(By.cssSelector("button[class='_2KpZ6l _2U9uOA _3v1-ww']")).click();

				
				//Increase the quantity by 1
				driver.findElement(By.cssSelector("button[class='_23FHuj']")).click();
				//it will print after addition of quantity
				System.out.println(driver.findElement(By.cssSelector("span[xpath='1']")).getText());
				driver.close();
				
	}

}
